title: Loads on structures
brief_description: SUMMARY: Robert Heller discusses static and dynamic loads. He describes the deformations and stresses that they are produced by dynamic oscillation and presents news footage which shows the disastrous effects of loads on structures. Includes scenes of the collapse of the Tacoma Narrows bridge;”Years 7-12”
